mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority = #{authority,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

profile = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, profile = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
